Key Match Events: Hawkins buried a 3 in the third for a 70-67 lead
McCollum buried a 3 in the fourth to push the lead back to 10 points
McCollum put the finishing touches on the win with a 12-foot step back jumper
Pre-Game Insights: The Pelicans played without the suspended Zion Williamson and forward Herb Jones
The 76ers played without All-Star center Joel Embiid
Post-Match Reflections: The Pelicans snapped a two-game losing streak and won for only the third time since Dec. 7
The Sixers are just 8-15 when Embiid doesn't play
Miscellaneous Highlights: McCollum hit six 3s and made 13 of 24 shots overall from the floor
The Sixers are 15-21 and hoping to make the play-in tournament
Others: The Pelicans play at Boston on Sunday, and 76ers visit Orlando
